interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Magnetic Eyelashes and Magnetic Eyeliner Kit, Magnetic Eyelashes with Eyeliner, 5 Pairs Reusable Magnetic Eyelashes with Tweezer, False Lashes Review Date: 2020/06/27 Store: Eyenjoy Average Rating: 3.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Eyenjoy', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '5.71 x 5.39 x 0.71 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Magnet', 'Product Dimensions': '5.71 x 5.39 x 0.71 inches; 2.12 Ounces', 'UPC': '736067423758'} Review Text: I've always struggled with gluing in lashes and I had pretty much given up. I ordered these after a friend was telling me about how great magnetic liner is. I was super impressed with how easy it is for me to put these on.
I'm kind of confused on whether the liner is sticky and magnetic or just magnetic. I didn't let it dry all the way before doing my eyebrows and my lower eyelid got stuck to my upper eyelid. I couldn't tell if that was magnet pull or glue.
Whatever the liner is, it keeps those lashes in place and they are so easy to put on. The brush is thin but the thicker the line, the better it will hold on to the lashes.
My eye lids are sort of small and I think I'm going to have to trim these a tiny bit or the ends can be a little jabby in the corner of my eye.
I haven't worn these out yet due to the pandemic but I know the liner lasts because you have to scrub hard to get it off. These should last all day. Review Title: Nice selection, super easy to use. Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Hair Straightener Flat Iron for Straightening and Curling, Milantia 3/4 Inch Straightener for Bangs and Short Hair, Dual Voltage Ionic Mini Straightening Iron with Travelling Pouch and EU Adapter Milantia {'Shape': 'Flat', 'Brand': 'Milantia', 'Hair Type': 'Frizzy', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Size': '1 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '7.09 x 0.79 x 1.57 inches; 7.1 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'LM-161', 'Manufacturer': 'Milantia'} I straighten my hair daily. This mini straightener is perfect for camping and on the go. I actually got this to keep at the office for emergencies but I'll be taking it with me when I go camping too.
Due to the smaller size it takes a little longer to straighten my hair. This isn't ideal for every day use unless you have really short hair, but it works great in a pinch or when you are trying to pack light.
It comes with a pretty blue green travel case/bag. It has dual voltage 100-240V and an adapter for worldwide travel.
It has 1 heat setting and that's 410°. This worked fine for me because that's the temp my regular straightener is set at. Perfect for my purse, the office and camping. Magnetic Eyelashes and Magnetic Eyeliner Kit, Magnetic Eyelashes with Eyeliner, 5 Pairs Reusable Magnetic Eyelashes with Tweezer, False Lashes Eyenjoy {'Brand': 'Eyenjoy', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '5.71 x 5.39 x 0.71 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Magnet', 'Product Dimensions': '5.71 x 5.39 x 0.71 inches; 2.12 Ounces', 'UPC': '736067423758'} I've always struggled with gluing in lashes and I had pretty much given up. I ordered these after a friend was telling me about how great magnetic liner is. I was super impressed with how easy it is for me to put these on.
I'm kind of confused on whether the liner is sticky and magnetic or just magnetic. I didn't let it dry all the way before doing my eyebrows and my lower eyelid got stuck to my upper eyelid. I couldn't tell if that was magnet pull or glue.
Whatever the liner is, it keeps those lashes in place and they are so easy to put on. The brush is thin but the thicker the line, the better it will hold on to the lashes.
My eye lids are sort of small and I think I'm going to have to trim these a tiny bit or the ends can be a little jabby in the corner of my eye.
I haven't worn these out yet due to the pandemic but I know the liner lasts because you have to scrub hard to get it off. These should last all day. Nice selection, super easy to use.
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Primary Use Case:** Frequently straightens hair for convenience and travel, now also exploring makeup enhancements, particularly magnetic eyelashes for ease of use.
- **Behavior Patterns:** Values practicality and versatility; seeks products that serve multiple purposes (e.g., travel, office emergencies) and appreciate user-friendly applications in makeup.
- **Hair Type & Needs:** Deals with frizzy hair and prefers products that effectively manage texture.
- **Product Features:** Appreciates miniaturized designs that are easy to transport (e.g., fitting in a purse) and are equipped with dual voltage for global use; now also values easy application features in beauty products.
- **Performance Requirements:** Focuses on high heat settings for effective styling; doesn't mind a longer usage time if it meets emergency needs. Prefers makeup that is long-lasting and resistant to wear.
- **Aesthetic Preferences:** Shows an appreciation for attractive packaging (e.g., colorful travel cases) and neatly designed beauty products.
- **Overall Satisfaction:** Tends to rate products highly when they meet specific functional needs efficiently, recently demonstrating satisfaction with easy-to-use beauty tools despite minor usability challenges.

The user continues to exhibit a preference for practical, user-friendly products that facilitate both hair styling and makeup application on-the-go, while maintaining a high standard of effectiveness and convenience.
